ctl:test.name: wfs:run-Transaction-POST
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: Run test group for Transaction requests using the POST method

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Transaction-tc1.1
test.assertion: The response to a transaction request containing an insert statement must include a listing of identifiers for all successfully inserted features.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) TransactionSummary/totalInserted = 3; and (3) the wfs:InsertResults element has three child wfs:Feature elements.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Transaction-tc2.1
test.assertion: The global srsName attribute must be applied to all submitted geometries which do not specify an alternative supported CRS.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is schema valid; (2) TransactionSummary/totalInserted = 1; and (3) the wfs:InsertResults element has one child wfs:Feature element.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Transaction-tc2.2
test.assertion: The response to a Transaction request that specifies an unsupported Insert/srsName value must include an exception report.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is a valid ows:ExceptionReport; (2) the reported exceptionCode is "InvalidParameterValuePhase".

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Transaction-tc3.1
test.assertion: Insert statements containing features having a geometry value in an unsupported CRS shall be skipped if atomic transactions are not supported. Otherwise the transaction must fail and an exception report is generated.
test.comment: Pass if the features contained in failing insert statements are not inserted. The response must satify either of the following cases: (1) it includes a valid ows:ExceptionReport; (2) it includes a wfs:TransactionResponse/wfs:TransactionResults element indicating the failing statement.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Expected wfs:InsertResults to have 1 child element

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Transaction-tc4.1
test.assertion: Transaction statements must be processed in document order.
test.comment: Pass if the insert, update, and delete statements are processed in the correct order. The response message must report that one feature was inserted, one was deleted, and none were updated.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Transaction-tc5.1
test.assertion: The response to a Transaction request containing one or more update statements must report how many features were updated.
test.comment: Pass if the update statements are processed correctly. The response message must report that one feature was inserted and one was updated.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Transaction-tc6.1
test.assertion: The response to a wfs:Native statement in which safeToIgnore="false" must include an exception report.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is a valid ows:ExceptionReport; (2) the reported exceptionCode is "InvalidParameterValuePhase".

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Transaction-tc7.1
test.assertion: The response to a Transaction request that updates a complex property value must report how many features were updated.
test.comment: Pass if the update statement modifying a geometry property is processed correctly. The response message must report that one feature was inserted and one was updated.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Expected geometry value is gml:MultiSurface (feature gml:id="")

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Transaction-tc7.2
test.assertion: The response to a Transaction/Update request that attempts to update a geometry property having coordinates that do not correspond to the default CRS shall report a failing update statement.
test.comment: Pass if the wfs:TransactionResults/wfs:Action element in the response refers the failing insert statement.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Transaction-tc8.1
test.comment: Pass if all properties are successfully updated.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Transaction-tc9.1
test.assertion: An update request that attempts to remove a required feature property must give rise to an exception report.
test.comment: Pass if the update fails and an exception report is returned.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Transaction-tc10.1
test.assertion: An update request that attempts to update a property with an incongruent value must fail; the failing update statements must be referenced in the transaction response.
test.comment: Pass if all failed update statements have corresponding wfs:Action elements in the response.

xsl:when.ctl:message: FAILURE: Missing or invalid response entity.

xsl:if.ctl:message: FAILURE: Expected 2 wfs:Action elements in response.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Transaction-tc11.1
test.assertion: In response to an update request that does not include a value for an optional property, the property shall be removed.
test.comment: Pass if the update succeeds and the properties are removed.

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Transaction-tc12.1
test.assertion: The response to a Transaction request that includes a delete statement without a filter (i.e. an invalid request) must include an exception report.
test.comment: Pass if all of the following conditions are true: (1) the response is a valid ows:ExceptionReport; (2) the reported exceptionCode is "MissingParameterValuePhase".

test.name: wfs:wfs-1.1.0-Transaction-tc13.1
test.assertion: In response to a valid delete request, all matching features shall be deleted.
test.comment: Pass if the delete actions succeed.

ctl:test.name: wfs:Transaction-invalid-lock
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: A transaction request with an invalid lock identifier returns an exception.

ctl:test.name: wfs:Transaction-idgen-generate-new
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: In response to an Insert Transaction request with idgen=GenerateNew, the service generates unique identifiers for the newly inserted feature instances.

ctl:test.name: wfs:Transaction-idgen-use-existing
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: In response to an Insert Transaction request with idgen=UseExisting where the identifiers are new values that do not belong to any existing features in the WFS, the service uses the existing gml:id identifiers for the newly inserted feature instances.

ctl:test.name: wfs:Transaction-idgen-use-existing-update
ctl:test.ctl:assertion: In response to an Insert Transaction request with idgen=UseExisting where one of the identifiers used belongs to any existing features in the WFS, the service returns an exception.
